Description: Title:The candidate shall be B.Tech in mech with relevant experience is stress and support engineering in off shore/whp/flng/fpso/ onshore . fully conversant with all offshore load cases .. including fatigue, blast, hog sag conditions...with more than 7 years in oil and gas field is a must. able to handle a team of engineers and exposure to multicenter execution and client coordination. caesar ii with nozzlepro/AIV/FIV is mustJob Details
